metadata.title: CVE-2022-4170 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The rxvt-unicode package is vulnerable to a remote code execution, in thePerl background extension, when an attacker can control the data written tothe user's terminal and certain options are set.

criterions.comment: rxvt-unicode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
